articles.title: US defense chief says China muscling neighbors, plundering resources in Pacific - CNN

articles.title: Largest cultivated chicken meat facility in Asia breaks ground in Singapore - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Lab-grown chicken could soon be on the menus of more eateries in Singapore, and perhaps on the shelves of supermarkets.

On Friday (Jun 10), GOOD Meat broke ground on premises in Bedok that will be the largest cultivated meat production facility …
